titles.title: To suspend temporarily the rate of duty on certain polycrystalline fibers designed for use in pollution control devices for motor vehicles.
To suspend temporarily the rate of duty on certain polycrystalline fibers designed for use in pollution control devices for motor vehicles.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on certain polycrystalline fibers designed for use in pollution control devices for motor vehicles.
